resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81569</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81569</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>7056</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Deutschsprachige Länder Europas</string>
            <string language="es">Deutschsprachige Länder Europas</string>
            <string language="ga">Deutschsprachige Länder Europas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Deutschsprachige Länder Europas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Deutschsprachige Länder Europas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Deutschsprachige Länder Europas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Deutschsprachige Länder Europas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ομόσπονδα κρατίδια Europas Deutschsprachige</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Learners will improve their general knowledge of German speaking countries and will learn the relevant vocabulary.</string>
            <string language="es">Los estudiantes mejorarán su conocimiento general de los países de habla alemana y aprenderán el vocabulario relevante.</string>
            <string language="ga">Feabhsóidh foghlaimeoirí a n-eolas ginearálta ar thíortha a labhrann Gearmáinis agus foghlaimeoidh siad an fhoclóir chuí.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">German</string>
            <string language="es">Alemán</string>
            <string language="ga">Gearmáinis</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anfänger verbessern ihr Allgemeinwissen der 
deutschsprechenden Länder und erlernen den relevanten Wortschatz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants amélioreront leur connaissance 
générale des pays de langue allemande et apprendront le vocabulaire 
approprié.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os learners melhorarão seu conhecimento geral de 
países faladores alemães e aprenderão o vocabulário relevante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I principianti miglioreranno la loro conoscenza 
generale dei paesi di lingua tedesca ed impareranno il vocabolario 
relativo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι αρχάριοι θα βελτιώσουν τη γενική γνώση γερμανικών 
μιλώντας χωρών τους και θα μάθουν το σχετικό λεξιλόγιο.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Deutsch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Allemand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Alemão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tedesco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γερμανικά</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>7056</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
FN:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
ORG:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>learner</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>teacher</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <context>
            <source>LRE.contextValues</source>
            <value>compulsory education</value>
          </context>
          <language>en</language>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-t-lre">13-16</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>assessment</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
FN:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
ORG:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:Scoilnet;
FN:Scoilnet
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>548</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
